item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
TEMPLE GRILL

Specials are from 6-8
$1 off beers
$5 martinis
Food all night long as long as we keep drinking.

Can you tell we like Temple Grill!!

**ALSO, please drop some extra change into the donation milk carton for the NHC dues. Meetup.com charges a monthly fee for us to have this wonderful networking site and ROBEN should not have to foot the bill, so please give a little something towards the fees. Those not at this event will have the chance to donate at another one!**

Contact is Robyn- Allise-203-823-5302
item.name: Summer Happy Hour: Temple Grill #2
